display_long_description:
This party-style platform game is designed around the core gameplay mechanic of using your own hands for quick movement, double jumping, and interaction to pursue different game objectives in various game modes. Throughout the game's lifecycle, you can continuously grow and improve in several aspects, such as level, ranking, and achievements.  The initial versions of the game modes include Challenge Mode, Competitive Mode, Party Mode,  with more modes to be added as development progresses.

Early Access version has two mode: Coop mode and Race. Others will be updated later.

- Scene Interaction: Level elements are based on physical properties, such as pushing and pulling objects, seesaws, carts, chandeliers, swinging pendulums, windmills, controlling switches, buttons, springs, and a variety of mechanical traps with physical properties, etc.

- Cooperative Competition: The game is primarily designed for party play, offering various game modes, including race and  cooperative competition mode. In the competition mode, players must both collaborate and compete against each other to vie for rankings in level completion. The maximum number of players varies across different modes, with the highest being up to 16 players.

- Character Customization: Players can personalize their characters.
